p: Ae. africanus were only encountered in peri-urban and rural habitats, and mostly during the rainy season, while Cx. pipiens s.l. was only found in urban areas, and in higher quantity in the dry season. On the other hand, Cx. (Culiciomyia) spp., Cx. duttoni and Ae. albopictus were caught in the three habitat types, with significant differences in their abundances in both seasons.
